mapper.select:
select itemid,name,description,price,degree,pictureurl,publishtime,positionx,positiony from item where
category = #{categoryType} and
degree >= 10 and
degree >= 9 and
degree >=8 and
degree >= 7 and
degree <= 6 and
status = 0 and positionx between #{longiMin} and #{longiMax} and positiony between #{latiMin} and #{latiMax} order by publishtime desc
mapper.insert: insert into item (itemid, name, description, price, degree, category, positionx, positiony, address, pictureurl, sellerid, sellername, sellerphone, publishtime, expiredtime) values(#{itemID}, #{itemName}, #{itemDescription}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemDegree}, #{itemCategory}, #{positionX}, #{positionY}, #{itemAddress}, #{imgURL}, #{sellerID}, #{sellerName}, #{sellerTel}, #{publishTime}, #{expiredTime})
mapper.update: update item set status=1 where itemid=#{itemID} and sellerid=#{userID}
mapper.select: select itemid,name,description,price,degree,pictureurl,publishtime,positionx,positiony from item where name like "%"#{keyword}"%" order by publishtime desc limit #{start}, #{count}
